content.description: Emily was scratched several times by the family’s cat when visiting her friend’s house. She reflexively pulled back in pain and surprise when it happened. Now, when she visits that house, she backs away at the sight of the cat, even if it is in another room far from her.
content.question: In this scenario, Emily’s behavior when she was first scratched is best labeled as which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
